text:
The most popular recipes on 'Cooking With Dog'
have been for bento.

I Francis, asked people all over Japan
for their favorite bento ingredients.

Japanese bentos typically feature 'Karaage,'
Japanese fried chicken, and 'Tamagoyaki' rolled eggs.
This is because, they can be eaten hot or cold.

I left the comfort zone of my kitchen,
so I could teach all of you

as much as you want to know
about Japanese bento.
It is sad to travel alone, without Chef.

But, I will do my best to show you,
the wonders of Japanese food culture.
